DOC.brief_summary: This study design multi-center randomize control trial , compare two group patient symptomatic extra-articular malunited distal radius fracture . One group patient undergo corrective surgery distal radius , preoperative computer-assisted plan virtual osteotomy , group undergo corrective surgery , conventional ( non-computer-assisted ) preoperative planning . The investigator hypothesize computer-assisted surgical planning result well functional outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Computer Assisted Planing Corrective Osteotomy Distal Radius Malunion
DOC.criteria: Extraarticular distal radius malunion require surgery Adult patient ( > 18 yo ) Fluent English Pregnant patient Prisoner Abnormal contralateral forearm
